director.name: 大卫·普里查德 David Pritchard

trans_title: 里克·斯坦的佳肴名人堂
introduction: 这是一档英国美食烹饪节目。节目主持人里克·斯坦带着他忠实的伙伴狗狗Chalky，通过采访英国各地的名厨与餐馆老板们带领观众在英国各地进行佳肴烹饪者的发掘之旅。里克周游全英国的同时，也与全国各地的观众分享这些烹饪者的故事和食谱。Rick Stein's Food Heroes is a cooking program that takes viewers on a gastronomic tour of the length and breadth of Britain by the hand of English celebrity chef, restaurateur and television presenter Rick Stein and his loyal sidekick dog Chalky. Stein travels around the country in search of quality British produce while sharing stories and recipes with viewers throughout.
chinese_title: 里克·斯坦的佳肴名人堂
